title: 怎么让服务器不自动生成world_nether和world_the_end这两个文件啊
author: X836696023

replies.author: AAAA哥
replies.txt_content:
打开server.properties文件，找到以下两行代码，设置为false
hellworld=true
allow-nether=true复制代码

replies.author: X836696023
replies.txt_content:
AAAA哥 发表于 2018-3-10 21:40
打开server.properties文件，找到以下两行代码，设置为false
没有：
hellworld=true
这段代码
只有：
allow-nether=true
但是设置以后只是
world_nether
不自动生成了

replies.author: X836696023
replies.txt_content:
AAAA哥 发表于 2018-3-10 21:40
打开server.properties文件，找到以下两行代码，设置为false
#Minecraft server properties
#Sun Mar 11 16:21:22 CST 2018
generator-settings=
force-gamemode=false
allow-nether=false
gamemode=2
broadcast-console-to-ops=true
enable-query=false
player-idle-timeout=0
difficulty=1
spawn-monsters=true
op-permission-level=4
resource-pack-hash=
announce-player-achievements=true
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=DEFAULT
hardcore=false
enable-command-block=false
max-players=60000
network-compression-threshold=256
max-world-size=29999984
server-port=101
debug=false
server-ip=
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=false
level-name=world
view-distance=10
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=false
generate-structures=true
online-mode=false
max-build-height=256
level-seed=
motd=A Minecraft Server
enable-rcon=false
